Class SpatialPathBatchBuilder

java.lang.Object
com.arbergashi.charts.engine.spatial.SpatialPathBatchBuilder
All Implemented Interfaces:
SpatialChunkConsumer
public final class SpatialPathBatchBuilder extends Object implements SpatialChunkConsumer
Builds render-ready path batches from spatial buffers with clipping transitions.

Platform-independent and headless-certified. No AWT/Swing dependencies.

Since:
1.7.0
Version:
1.7.0
Author:
Arber Gashi

      public void accept(SpatialBuffer buffer, int count)
      Description copied from interface: SpatialChunkConsumer
      Processes a filled spatial buffer.
      Specified by:
      accept in interface SpatialChunkConsumer
      Parameters:
      buffer - spatial buffer containing input/output coords
      count - number of valid points in the buffer

    • setLineSegment

      public SpatialPathBatchBuilder setLineSegment(double x1, double y1, double z1, double x2, double y2, double z2)
      Appends a single line segment to the batch as an isolated path.

      This helper resets the path state to avoid linking segments across calls.

      Parameters:
      x1 - first x
      y1 - first y
      z1 - first z
      x2 - second x
      y2 - second y
      z2 - second z
      Returns:
      this builder
